sentences.en: The media depict him as a left-wing bogeyman.
sentences.cn: 媒体把他描绘成一个左翼怪物。

sentences.en: Although we still depict nostalgic snow scenes on Christmas cards, winters are now very much warmer.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们还在圣诞卡上描绘引人怀旧的雪景，但现在冬天温暖多了。

sentences.en: It didn't depict scenes or models exactly as they looked.
sentences.cn: 它没有准确如实地描述场景或模型。
